title: Her Protective Giant
description: Brennan is as giant as they come, but he would never use his size to do harm.Quite the opposite—he’s gentle, protective, and caring, whether it’s for the niece he babysits or the pretty librarian he has a secret crush on.When a windstorm brings the pretty librarian deeper into his life, he finds himself unable to keep his crush a secret any longer.But will his suppressed dominant side stay safely tucked away?Dear Reader,She’s a curious librarian. He’s the mysterious man she can’t stop wondering about. If you're in the mood for a gentle giant who isn’t so gentle in the bedroom and a heart-warming happily-ever-after, this short ’n steamy romance is for you!xo,Kate
author: Kate Hunt
